ygData.subject: Mistmoore Battle Drums
ygData.msgSnippet: Woohoo!  I got my mm drums this weekend.  I m running all of the place just for the heck of it now (wait, I did that all the before anyway)! No major story to
ygData.messageBody:
Woohoo! I got my mm drums this weekend. I'm running all of the place just
for the heck of it now (wait, I did that all the before anyway)!

No major story to tell. Grouped with a monk last week who an alt for a 52
wizard. He offered to sell them to me since he had decided not to make a
bard. Got a good deal on them at only 500pp!

Now I just have to make enough plat to bank a few upcoming songs and then
it's back to Kunark at light speed!

Gilgurth
Bard of 24 Winces
E'ci
